content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Water Supply System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5), storage tank (position x=-6.5, y=-0.5) and pipes connecting them (PipeGroup at position x=-8.5, y=-0.5). The water supply system is attempted to be connected to the boiler (position x=21.5, y=44.0) through a complex network of pipes.

### Crude Oil Extraction System at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack (position x=17.5, y=40.5), crude oil storage tank (position x=21.5, y=40.5) and pipes connecting them (PipeGroup at position x=18.5, y=38.5). The crude oil storage tank is connected to the oil refinery through pipes (PipeGroup at position x=11.5, y=33.5).

### Electricity Generation System at position(21.5, 44.0)
Consists of boiler (position x=21.5, y=44.0), steam engine (position x=25.5, y=46.5) and pipes attempted to be connected between boiler and steam engine (PipeGroup). The steam engine is connected to the pumpjack and oil refinery through power poles (ElectricityGroup id=82318).

### Oil Refinery at position(29.5, 39.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position x=29.5, y=39.5) connected to the crude oil storage tank through pipes and to the steam engine through power poles.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable positions
- Ensure the target location is clear and placeable before attempting to place an entity. (Step 3)

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure entities are properly aligned and positioned to be connected with pipes. Clear potential blockages before attempting to connect entities. (Step 5, Step 6, Step 11, Step 16, Step 21, Step 23, Step 26, Step 27, Step 29, Step 30, Step 33, Step 36, Step 37, Step 40, Step 41, Step 42, Step 44, Step 45, Step 48, Step 49, Step 51, Step 52, Step 53, Step 54, Step 55, Step 56, Step 61, Step 62, Step 63, Step 64, Step 65, Step 68, Step 69, Step 70, Step 72, Step 74, Step 75, Step 77, Step 78, Step 80, Step 81, Step 82, Step 84, Step 85, Step 87, Step 89, Step 90, Step 91, Step 97, Step 98, Step 99, Step 100, Step 101, Step 102, Step 103, Step 104, Step 107, Step 108, Step 109, Step 110, Step 111)

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities
- Ensure the entity has an inventory before attempting to inspect it. (Step 9, Step 18, Step 22, Step 32)

### Errors when accessing attributes of entities
- Ensure the attribute exists for the entity before attempting to access it. (Step 10)

### Errors when connecting entities without fluid in the source entity
- Ensure the source entity has fluid in it before attempting to connect it to another entity. (Step 8, Step 16, Step 21, Step 26, Step 27, Step 29, Step 30, Step 33, Step 36, Step 37, Step 40, Step 41, Step 42, Step 44, Step 45, Step 48, Step 49, Step 51, Step 52, Step 53, Step 54, Step 55, Step 61, Step 62, Step 63, Step 64, Step 65, Step 68, Step 69, Step 70, Step 72, Step 74, Step 75, Step 77, Step 78, Step 80, Step 81, Step 82, Step 84, Step 85, Step 87, Step 89, Step 90, Step 91, Step 97, Step 98, Step 99, Step 100, Step 101, Step 102, Step 103, Step 104, Step 107, Step 108, Step 109, Step 110, Step 111)

### Errors when clearing pipes
- Ensure the argument passed to clear pipes is an Entity or Prototype object.
